learning_resources.title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate
learning_resources.description: Industry-recognized certification validating ability to design distributed systems on AWS. Highly valued by employers for cloud roles.
learning_resources.career_impact: Opens doors to cloud architect and DevOps roles. Average salary increase of 15-20%.

learning_resources.title: Machine Learning Specialization
learning_resources.description: Comprehensive introduction to machine learning by Andrew Ng. Covers supervised learning, neural networks, and practical ML applications.
learning_resources.career_impact: Foundation for ML Engineer or Data Scientist roles. Gateway to AI field.

learning_resources.title: System Design Interview Course
learning_resources.description: Learn to design large-scale distributed systems. Essential for senior engineering interviews at top tech companies.
learning_resources.career_impact: Critical for senior engineering roles. Increases interview success rate significantly.

learning_resources.title: Kubernetes Administrator (CKA)
learning_resources.description: Professional certification for Kubernetes administrators. Proves hands-on ability to manage K8s clusters.
learning_resources.career_impact: High demand certification. Average salary premium of $20-30k for certified professionals.

learning_resources.title: React - The Complete Guide
learning_resources.description: Comprehensive React course covering fundamentals to advanced patterns. Includes real-world projects.
learning_resources.career_impact: Essential for frontend developer roles. React is the most in-demand frontend framework.

learning_resources.title: Data Engineering with Python
learning_resources.description: Learn to build data pipelines and infrastructure. Covers ETL, data warehousing, and orchestration tools.
learning_resources.career_impact: Data engineering is one of fastest growing roles. High demand, competitive salaries.

learning_resources.title: LangChain for LLM Application Development
learning_resources.description: Learn to build LLM-powered applications using LangChain. Covers chains, agents, and memory.
learning_resources.career_impact: Cutting-edge skill for AI/ML roles. High demand for GenAI developers.

learning_resources.title: Terraform Associate Certification
learning_resources.description: Validate your Terraform skills. Covers IaC concepts, Terraform workflow, and cloud provisioning.
learning_resources.career_impact: Standard for DevOps/Platform engineering roles. Demonstrates IaC competency.

learning_resources.title: Full Stack Open
learning_resources.description: Free, comprehensive full stack course. Covers modern JavaScript development end-to-end.
learning_resources.career_impact: Excellent for transitioning to full stack development. Highly regarded by employers.

learning_resources.title: Communication and Leadership for Tech Professionals
learning_resources.description: Develop soft skills essential for career advancement. Covers presenting, leading teams, and stakeholder management.
learning_resources.career_impact: Critical for moving into senior and management roles. Often the differentiator for promotions.

books.title: Designing Data-Intensive Applications
books.author: Martin Kleppmann
books.description: The bible of data systems design. Essential reading for any senior engineer.

books.title: Clean Code
books.author: Robert C. Martin
books.description: Learn to write readable, maintainable code. Timeless principles for all developers.

communities.name: Dev.to
communities.description: Inclusive community for developers. Great for sharing knowledge and networking.

communities.name: Local Tech Meetups
communities.description: Find local tech meetups for networking and learning. Great for career opportunities.
